test_data.question: How big is Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: Ghana has an area of approx. 239,567 square kilometres

test_data.question: How many people live in Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: In Ghana live 34,4 million people

test_data.question: Which ocean does Ghana’s coastline border?
test_data.expected_answer: Ghana boarders the Atlantic Ocean

test_data.question: How many regions does Ghana have?
test_data.expected_answer: Ghana has 16 regions

test_data.question: Which region is the capital city, Accra, located in?
test_data.expected_answer: The capital city of Ghana, Accra, is located in the Greater Accra Region

test_data.question: How many districts Ghana have?
test_data.expected_answer: Ghana has 261 districts

test_data.question: Which region is the biggest in Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: The biggest region in Ghana ist the Northern Region

test_data.question: What is the name of the largest lake in Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: The largest lake in Ghana ist the Lake Volta

test_data.question: Which part of Ghana is more rural: the north or the south?
test_data.expected_answer: The north part of Ghana is more rural than the south part

test_data.question: Which season in Ghana has the most rain?
test_data.expected_answer: The wet season in Ghana has the most rain

test_data.question: Which region of Ghana is the driest?
test_data.expected_answer: The Upper East Region is the driest region in Ghana

test_data.question: Which region of Ghana has the largest population?
test_data.expected_answer: The Ashanti Region has the largest population in Ghana with approx. 5,456,000 people

test_data.question: Which river is the largest in Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: The largest river in Ghana is the Volta River

test_data.question: Which part of Ghana experiences the most rainfall?
test_data.expected_answer: The south part of Ghana experiences the most rainfall

test_data.question: In which months is the rainy season most active in Ghana?
test_data.expected_answer: The rainy season in Ghana is most active between April and October

test_data.question: Which mountain in Ghana is the highest, and in which region is it located?
test_data.expected_answer: The Mount Afadja is the highest mountain in Ghana and it is located in Akwapim-Togo Ranges

test_data.question: I need a quick overview of the Agona West Municipal district, Ghana. How big is the area of this district and how was the tropical rainforest climate coverage between 1990-2000?
test_data.expected_answer: The Agona West Municipal district is approx. 356,41 square kilometres big. You can find this data in shapes_shape. The tropical rainforest climate coverage is given in the dataset koeppen_af. The coverage is 0 % and the data is available on a yearly resolution.

test_data.question: I need a quick overview of the Ahafo region, Ghana. How many districts are located in this region and how was the tropical savannah climate coverage of the district with the largest area?
test_data.expected_answer: The Ahafo region has 6 different regions, where Asunafo North Municipal is the largest district. The area is approx. 1,410.42 square kilometres. You can find this data in shapes_shape. The tropical savannah climate coverage is at 100 % and available from 1901-2020 on a yearly resolution. You can find the data in the dataset koeppen_aw.

test_data.question: I need a quick overview of the Ada East district, Ghana. How large is this district, how many people live there, and what is the most recent urbanization rate?
test_data.expected_answer: Here is an overview of the latest data points for the Ada East district in the Greater Accra region, Ghana: Area = 289.89 km² (as of 2021); Population: 92,943.0 (as of 2020); Urbanization rate: 4.46% (2019). Here is the link to view all available data for the Ada East district, in case you're interested in another data layer.

test_data.expected_answer: Unfortunately, I cannot find this dataset. Here is the link to view all available data for the Kumasi Metropolitan District, in case you're interested in another data layer.

test_data.question: I need the neighboring countries of Ghana. Is this dataset available?
test_data.expected_answer: Unfortunately, I cannot find this dataset. Here is the link to view all available data for Ghana, in case you're interested in another data layer.

test_data.question: Who was the president of Ghana in 2020?
test_data.expected_answer: Unfortunately, I cannot find this dataset. Here is the link to view all available data for Ghana, in case you're interested in another data layer.

test_data.question: For my research project on malaria, I need precipitation data for the period from January 2020 to December 2023. Are these data available, and in what resolution?
test_data.expected_answer: Thank you for your question. Yes, I have found precipitation data for Ghana. However, the data is only available for the period January 2021 to December 2023 in daily resolution. I can offer you two different data sources: Precipitation (satellite) (chirps_prcp) and Precipitation (station) (meteo_prcp).

test_data.question: I need the maximum temperatures from the Ada East District from 1950-2015. Is this dataset available?
test_data.expected_answer: the data is only available for the period January 1983 to December 2016 in daily resolution. You can find the data in chirts_tmax

test_data.question: I need the rainfall climate coverage from 1980-2022 for the Ahafo Ano North district. Is this dataset available?
test_data.expected_answer: the data is only available for the period 1901 to 2020 in yearly resolution. You can find the data in koeppen_af
